channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Unexpected GLP-1 Side Effect? Cheaper Airline Tickets
item.description: The weight loss drug boom could drive fuel costs down.

item.title: Las Vegas’s Sphere may be getting a sibling in an unexpected location

item.title: More than 13,000 pounds of chicken recalled over Listeria concerns
item.description: Nearly seven tons of ready-to-eat grilled chicken breast products are being recalled over Listeria concerns. According to a Jan. 16 U.S. Department of...

item.title: Culture Is What You Do, Not What You Print
item.description: Most startup founders think about culture way too late.

item.title: 3 ways to fall asleep faster, backed by decades of research
item.description: Struggling to fall asleep is irritating. Struggling to get enough sleep is at least partially debilitating . Research shows: People who sleep five to ...

item.title: Trump says he wants Greenland because he was rejected for a Nobel Peace Prize last year
item.description: The president revealed his motivation in a text message to Norway's Prime Minister, who has no say over Nobel awards.

item.title: Why small businesses are saying they aren’t planning on hiring many recent grads in 2026
item.description: Small businesses are planning to hire fewer recent college graduates than they did in 2025, making it likely harder for this cohort to find entry-leve...

item.title: How to Help Your Employees Who May Have Caregiving Duties for Kids or Parents
item.description: Small businesses can sometimes feel like families—but data show that right now many workers’ actual families are demanding more care.

item.title: Warren Buffett Explains Why You Can’t Make a Good Deal
item.description: Treat trust as a business asset.

item.title: Trump’s Gaza ‘Board of Peace’ extends invitations to Russia, Belarus and Thailand along with EU
item.description: It's unclear how many leaders have been invited to join the board.

item.title: PwC’s global chairman says most leaders have forgotten ‘the basics’ as 56% are still getting ‘nothing’ out of AI adoption
item.description: PwC's Mohamed Kande talked to Fortune about the "tri-modal mandate" for leaders to execute, transform and build: "I've not seen that in 25 years."

item.title: The curious case of the ICE pastor as Minnesota protesters disrupt church services and DOJ launches investigation
item.description: "To have someone serving as a pastor who oversees these ICE agents, is almost unfathomable to me,” said Nekima Levy Armstrong, a reverend herself.

item.title: What I Learned From Spending Over $50 Million on Marketing
item.description: Take an honest look at where your strategy can improve.
